tool_description: API to self host Torrent Hunt Bot
title: TorrentHunt

api_list.name: Config
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://torrenthunt.p.rapidapi.com/config"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "torrenthunt.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search queries on different torrent sources
